description:
When Wakasa asks if something good happened, Tatsumi shyly admits his manager gave him a raise and allows Wakasa to splurge a little. Wakasa grins at Tatsumi`s offer to splurge, and Tatsumi buys Wakasa a massive amount of milk. While Wakasa enjoys his milk bath, Mikuni, Maki, and Takasu arrive...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La situation de ma baignoire - Sept variations
The Seven Transformations of My Bathtub Circumstances
オレん家のフロ事情☆七変化
